title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, define the scope, and identify the key features and functionalities of the text analysis platform.

title: Design System Architecture for Global Text Analysis Platform
description: Design the overall system architecture for the advanced global text analysis platform. The architecture should include components, data flow, integration points, and considerations for scalability, maintainability, performance, multi-language support, error handling, and edge cases. This design should leverage AI techniques to process and analyze documents.

title: Develop Natural Language Processing (NLP) Models
description: Research, develop, and train NLP models for text analysis tasks such as sentiment analysis, named entity recognition, and topic modeling.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for text processing, analysis, and data management.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the text analysis platform, including document upload, analysis configuration, and result visualization.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement a scalable, efficient, and secure data storage and management solution. Consider using a combination of relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL for structured data) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB or Cassandra for unstructured or semi-structured data) based on the project's specific data requirements. Implement caching mechanisms (e.g., Redis) for frequently accessed data to improve performance, focusing on LRU, ARC, or other cache eviction strategies. Ensure the use of encryption at rest and in transit, and implement robust backup strategies (e.g., daily snapshots, transaction logs) to maintain data integrity. Consider implementing read/write replication, sharding, and partitioning for scalability.

title: Establish Security and Compliance Measures
description: Implement security measures, such as authentication, authorization, data encryption, secure communication protocols, and regular security audits, to ensure the platform's security and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS).

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD)
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the application. The pipeline should include the following stages: code linting, unit testing, integration testing, security scanning, build and packaging, and deployment to staging and production environments. Ensure that the pipeline is configured to automatically trigger on code changes and supports rollbacks in case of deployment failures.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the platform's quality and functionality.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the text analysis platform, covering installation, configuration, and usage instructions.
